basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Software Engineering graduate with 1 year of front-end web development experience. Passionate about crafting intuitive and efficient user interfaces that deliver exceptional experiences. Constantly learning new technologies and refining my skills.

summary: Built micro-frontend web applications for the banking sector using Angular, React, TypeScript, and SASS.
Maintained and evolved a Storybook component catalog, ensuring visual and functional consistency across applications.
Implemented backend services with Node.js and NestJS to support frontend capabilities.
Worked in an agile environment (Scrum/Kanban), contributing to daily standups, sprint planning, and code reviews.
Authored unit tests with Jest to guarantee software quality and stability.
Used Git and GitHub for source control and cross-team collaboration.
